description: The specific month and year for which the data is collected (e.g., May 2023).
The overall consumer confidence index value, indicating the level of confidence consumers have in the economy.
A metric indicating how consumers perceive their household finances over the past 30 days.
A metric indicating consumer expectations for their household finances over the next 12 months.
A metric indicating how consumers perceive house prices over the past 30 days.
A metric indicating consumer expectations for house prices over the next 12 months.
A metric indicating consumers' perceptions of job security over the past 30 days.
A metric indicating consumer expectations for job security over the next 12 months.
A metric reflecting consumers' perceptions of business activity over the past 30 days.
A metric indicating consumer expectations for business activity over the next 12 months.
